CustomField.description: Represents the total time an applications spends in a particular status(that is, the new status value on the record). It is the sum of Total time spent in new status + current status duration.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Represents the total time an applications spends in a particular status(that is, the new status value on the record). It is the sum of Total time spent in new status + current status duration.
CustomField.label: Total Time
